name: Awake (itch) (Berat Yıldız)
description:
The man and people who can not sleep embarks on an point and click adventure with colorful theme and humors and representation feels lika absurd.

Story

One of the inhabitants of Folivora town, Gum, wakes up one night and when he goes out he realizes that nobody sleeps. He needs to turn the people back to sleep to get back to sleep

Artist: Aycan Karataş

Designer: Hakan Burak Karaman

Developer: Berat Yıldız
